pullRequest.title: Fix artificially high queued query metrics
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #14705
Fixed a bug where queries that users cancelled early in their life-cycle would not decrement the queued queries counter, causing this metric to be artificially high.
== NO RELEASE NOTE ==

nodes.bodyText: Also add a check here to make sure we're not killing an already-running query.

beforeCommit.message:
* Moved the kill into the query state conditional so we don't need another check outside the while loop
* Switched my backward assertion calls
* Added a sleep to give the query stats time to update

afterCommit.message: Fix artificially high queued query metrics

commit.message: Fix artificially high queued query metrics

beforeCommit.message: Made the query status check continuous so we won't overshoot the desired status
